model.name: Calls
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE "Call" ( vmailmessage long OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'vmailmessage', NATIVE_TYPE 'long', SEARCHABLE 'UNSEARCHABLE'), daymins double OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'daymins', NATIVE_TYPE 'double', SEARCHABLE 'UNSEARCHABLE'), evemins double OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'evemins', NATIVE_TYPE 'double', SEARCHABLE 'UNSEARCHABLE'), nightmins double OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'nightmins', NATIVE_TYPE 'double', SEARCHABLE 'UNSEARCHABLE'), intlmins double OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'intlmins', NATIVE_TYPE 'double', SEARCHABLE 'UNSEARCHABLE'), custservcalls long OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'custservcalls', NATIVE_TYPE 'long', SEARCHABLE 'UNSEARCHABLE'), daycalls long OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'daycalls', NATIVE_TYPE 'long', SEARCHABLE 'UNSEARCHABLE'), daycharge double OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'daycharge', NATIVE_TYPE 'double', SEARCHABLE 'UNSEARCHABLE'), evecalls long OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'evecalls', NATIVE_TYPE 'long', SEARCHABLE 'UNSEARCHABLE'), evecharge double OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'evecharge', NATIVE_TYPE 'double', SEARCHABLE 'UNSEARCHABLE'), nightcalls long OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'nightcalls', NATIVE_TYPE 'long', SEARCHABLE 'UNSEARCHABLE'), nightcharge double OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'nightcharge', NATIVE_TYPE 'double', SEARCHABLE 'UNSEARCHABLE'), intlcalls long OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'intlcalls', NATIVE_TYPE 'long', SEARCHABLE 'UNSEARCHABLE'), intlcharge double OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'intlcharge', NATIVE_TYPE 'double', SEARCHABLE 'UNSEARCHABLE'), areacode long OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'areacode', NATIVE_TYPE 'long', SEARCHABLE 'UNSEARCHABLE'), phone string NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'phone', NATIVE_TYPE 'java.lang.String'), CONSTRAINT PK_PHONE PRIMARY KEY(phone) ) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'TRUE');

model.name: Contract_VBL
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW Contract ( Accountlength long OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"Account Length"', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Churn long OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'Churn', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Intlplan long OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"Int'l Plan"', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Vmailplan long OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"VMail Plan"', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), State string(10) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Areacode long OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"Area Code"', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Phone string(25) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'Phone', UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), CONSTRAINT Phone_PK PRIMARY KEY(Phone) ) OPTIONS("teiid_rel:MATVIEW_TTL" '0') AS SELECT * FROM Contracts.Contract;

model.name: Call_VBL
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW "Call" ( Vmailmessage long OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Daymins double OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Evemins double OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Nightmins double OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Intlmins double OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Custservcalls long OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Daycalls long OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Daycharge double OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Evecalls long OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Evecharge double OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Nightcalls long OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Nightcharge double OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Intlcalls long OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Intlcharge double OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Areacode long OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Phone string(20) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), CONSTRAINT Phone_PK PRIMARY KEY(Phone) ) AS SELECT * FROM Calls."Call";

model.name: Contract
Contracts
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE Contract ( accountlength long OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'accountlength', NATIVE_TYPE 'long', SEARCHABLE 'UNSEARCHABLE'), churn long OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'churn', NATIVE_TYPE 'long', SEARCHABLE 'UNSEARCHABLE'), intlplan long OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'intlplan', NATIVE_TYPE 'long', SEARCHABLE 'UNSEARCHABLE'), vmailplan long OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'vmailplan', NATIVE_TYPE 'long', SEARCHABLE 'UNSEARCHABLE'), state string OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'state', NATIVE_TYPE 'java.lang.String', SEARCHABLE 'UNSEARCHABLE'), areacode long OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'areacode', NATIVE_TYPE 'long', SEARCHABLE 'UNSEARCHABLE'), phone string NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE 'phone', NATIVE_TYPE 'java.lang.String'), CONSTRAINT PK_PHONE PRIMARY KEY(phone) ) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'TRUE');

model.name: CallContract_EDL
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW ChurnData ( Vmailmessage long OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Daymins double OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Evemins double OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Nightmins double OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Intlmins double OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Custservcalls long OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Daycalls long OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Daycharge double OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Evecalls long OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Evecharge double OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Nightcalls long OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Nightcharge double OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Intlcalls long OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Intlcharge double OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Areacode string(10) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Phone string(20) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Accountlength long OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Churn string(10) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Intlplan long OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), Vmailplan long OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), State string(10) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'FALSE'), CONSTRAINT Phone_PK PRIMARY KEY(Phone) ) AS SELECT Call_VBL."Call".Vmailmessage, Call_VBL."Call".Daymins, Call_VBL."Call".Evemins, Call_VBL."Call".Nightmins, Call_VBL."Call".Intlmins, Call_VBL."Call".Custservcalls, Call_VBL."Call".Daycalls, Call_VBL."Call".Daycharge, Call_VBL."Call".Evecalls, Call_VBL."Call".Evecharge, Call_VBL."Call".Nightcalls, Call_VBL."Call".Nightcharge, Call_VBL."Call".Intlcalls, Call_VBL."Call".Intlcharge, convert(Call_VBL."Call".Areacode, string) AS Areacode, Call_VBL."Call".Phone, Contract_VBL.Contract.Accountlength, convert(Contract_VBL.Contract.Churn, string) AS Churn, Contract_VBL.Contract.Intlplan, Contract_VBL.Contract.Vmailplan, Contract_VBL.Contract.State FROM Call_VBL."Call", Contract_VBL.Contract WHERE Call_VBL."Call".Phone = Contract_VBL.Contract.Phone;
